9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet performed Tawaf upon his mount, so when he arrived at the (Black Stone) corner, he pointed to it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الطَّوَافِ رَاكِبًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Riding For Tawaf
